sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Flex, Box, Avatar, Text, Icon } from "@chakra-ui/core";

const ListItem = props => {
  return (
    <Flex alignItems="top" mb={6}>
      <Avatar name="Dan Abrahmov" src="https://bit.ly/dan-abramov" />
      <Box ml={4}>
        <Text color="gray.900">Bernard Lane</Text>
        <Text color="gray.500">
          Rick Jones has been Hulk's best bud since day one, but now he's more
          than a friend...he's a teammate! Transformed by a Gamma energy
          explosion, A-Bomb's thick, armored skin is just as strong and powerful
          as it is blue. And when he curls into action, he uses it like a giant
          bowling ball of destruction!
        </Text>
      </Box>
      <Flex alignItems="center" px={10}>
        {/* <Icon name="star" color="gray.200" cursor="pointer" /> */}
        <Icon name="star" color="yellow.300" cursor="pointer" />
      </Flex>
      <Box
        color="gray.500"
        fontWeight="semibold"
        letterSpacing="wide"
        fontSize="xs"
        textTransform="uppercase"
        ml="2"
      >
        {3} comics • {2} series
      </Box>
    </Flex>
  );
};

export default ListItem;
